name: REC/REW
description:
REC/REW tells the story of a man in his early twenties, living in what could be our world in a matter of a few decades. As he divides his time between his college life, his friends and the struggle to win the heart of his long-time crush, an unexpected event shatters this blissfully ordinary existence.

Will he accept the challenge and set on a journey to find out what lies beyond the veil?

You forgot to turn off the recorder when you left home earlier this morning.

... Even so, why do you care?

You could get back home, press the REW button and call it a day. Or, you could press the REC button and start recording from scratch. You may find out the answer.

The answer to... what?

The answer to the question, what else? Then again, perhaps the problem is...

... Which question?
